channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Payments
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Payments

item.title: CVE-2019-2782|2024-10-15T18:57:45.123Z -- oracle%20corporation -- payments
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Payments component of Oracle E-Business Suite (subcomponent: File Transmission). Supported versions that are affected are 12.1.1 - 12.1.3 and 12.2.3 - 12.2.8. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Payments. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Payments accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.5 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).

item.title: CVE-2019-2783|2024-10-15T18:57:36.377Z -- oracle%20corporation -- payments
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Payments component of Oracle E-Business Suite (subcomponent: File Transmission). Supported versions that are affected are 12.1.1 - 12.1.3 and 12.2.3 - 12.2.8. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Payments. While the vulnerability is in Oracle Payments, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Payments accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.8 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:C/C:L/I:N/A:N).

item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Payments component of Oracle E-Business Suite (subcomponent: File Transmission). Supported versions that are affected are 12.1.1 - 12.1.3 and 12.2.3 - 12.2.8. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Payments. While the vulnerability is in Oracle Payments, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Payments accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.8 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:C/C:L/I:N/A:N).

item.title: CVE-2019-2775|2024-10-15T18:57:54.639Z -- oracle%20corporation -- payments
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Payments component of Oracle E-Business Suite (subcomponent: File Transmission). Supported versions that are affected are 12.1.1 - 12.1.3 and 12.2.3 - 12.2.8. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Payments. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized creation, deletion or modification access to critical data or all Oracle Payments accessible data and unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of Oracle Payments. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 9.1 (Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:H/A:H).
